blackice.name: Y1S1_BlackIce
blackice.description:
Operation Black Ice is the 1st season of the 1st year of Rainbow Six Siege.
Main additions:
- Canadian operators Buck and Frost
- New map Yatch

dustline.name: Y1S2_DustLine
dustline.description:
Operation Dust Line is the 2nd season of the 1st year of Rainbow Six Siege.
Main additions:
- American operators Blackbeard and Valkyrie
- New map Border
- Headgears
- Loadout customization between rounds

skullrain.name: Y1S3_SkullRain
skullrain.description:
Operation Skull Rain is the 3rd season of the 1st year of Rainbow Six Siege.
Main additions:
- Brazilian operators Capitao and Caveira
- New map Favela
- Tactical Realism
- Updated UI and HUD
- Angled Grip
- Claymore and Impact Grenades secondary gadgets

redcrow.name: Y1S4_RedCrow
redcrow.description:
Operation Red Crow is the 4th season of the 1st year of Rainbow Six Siege.
Main additions:
- Japanese operators Hibana and Echo
- New map Skyscraper
- Bartlett University rework
- Caliber-based destruction
- Uniforms
- SMG-11 ACOG removed

velvetshell.name: Y2S1_VelvetShell
velvetshell.description:
Operation Velvet Shell is the 1st season of the 2nd year of Rainbow Six Siege.
Main additions:
- Spanish operators Jackal and Mira
- New map Coastline
- Updated main menu

health.name: Y2S2_Health
health.description:
Operation Health is the 2nd season of the 2nd year of Rainbow Six Siege.
Main additions:
- Updated Pre- and Post-Match Squad Flow

bloodorchid.name: Y2S3_BloodOrchid
bloodorchid.description:
Operation Blood Orchid is the 3rd season of the 2nd year of Rainbow Six Siege.
Main additions:
- Hong Kong operators Ying and Lesion and polish operator Ela
- New map Theme Park
- Attackers can now use both their drones at once
- MP7 and 416-C ACOG removed

whitenoise.name: Y2S4_WhiteNoise
whitenoise.description:
Operation White Noise is the 4th season of the 2nd year of Rainbow Six Siege.
Main additions:
- South korean operators Dokkaebi and Vigil and polish operator Zofia
- New map Tower

chimera.name: Y3S1_Chimera
chimera.description:
Operation Chimera is the 1st season of the 3rd year of Rainbow Six Siege. [Event: Outbreak]
Main additions:
- Russian operator Finka and French operator Lion

parabellum.name: Y3S2_ParaBellum
parabellum.description:
Operation Parabellum is the 2nd season of the 3rd year of Rainbow Six Siege.
Main additions:
- Italian operators Alibi and Maestro
- New map Villa
- Clubhouse map buff
- Bulletproof Camera secondary gadget
- Pick & Ban
- HUD update

grimsky.name: Y3S3_GrimSky
grimsky.description:
Operation Grim Sky is the 3rd season of the 3rd year of Rainbow Six Siege. [Event: Mad House]
Main additions:
- American operator Maverick and British operator Clash
- Hereford Base map rework
- Recoil rework

windbastion.name: Y3S4_WindBastion
windbastion.description:
Operation Wind Bastion is the 4t season of the 3rd year of Rainbow Six Siege. [Event: Road to S.I. 2019]
Main additions:
- Moroccan operators Nomad and Kaid
- New map Fortress
- Consulate map buff

burnthorizon.name: Y4S1_BurntHorizon
burnthorizon.description:
Operation Burnt Horizon is the 1st season of the 4th year of Rainbow Six Siege. [Event: Rainbow is Magic v1]
Main additions:
- Australian operators Gridlock and Mozzie
- New map Outback
- Removed R4-C ACOG
- Advanced Gadget Deployment

phantomsight.name: Y4S2_PhantomSight
phantomsight.description:
Operation Phantom Sight is the 2nd season of the 4th year of Rainbow Six Siege. [Event: Showdown]
Main additions:
- Danish operator Nokk and American operator Warden
- Kafe map rework
- Glaz rework
- Removed the possibilites for Draws in Bomb/Secure Area/Hostage
- Reduced menu loading time

emberrise.name: Y4S3_EmberRise
emberrise.description:
Operation Ember Rise is the 3rd season of the 4th year of Rainbow Six Siege. [Event: Doktor's Curse v1]
Main additions:
- Peruvian operator Amaru and Mexican operator Goyo
- Kanal map rework
- New operators menu
- Reworked Deployabled Shield secondary gadget
- Bombers and C4/Barbed wire removed from Terrorists Hunt
- Improved shotgun destruction

shiftingtides.name: Y4S4_ShiftingTides
shiftingtides.description:
Operation Shifting Tides is the 4th season of the 4th year of Rainbow Six Siege. [Event: Road to S.I. 2020]
Main additions:
- Indian operator Kali and Kenyan operator Wamai
- Theme Park map rework
- Limb penetration system
- New Mira and Hibana voice actors

voidedge.name: Y5S1_VoidEdge
voidedge.description:
Operation Void Edge is the 1st season of the 5th year of Rainbow Six Siege. [Event: The Grand Larceny]
Main additions:
- Dutch operator Iana and Jordanian operator Oryx
- Oregon map rework
- Barricade debris rework
- Attacker drones spawns are no longer random
- updated main menu

steelwave.name: Y5S2_SteelWave
steelwave.description:
Operation Steel Wave is the 2nd season of the 5th year of Rainbow Six Siege. [Event: Mute Protocol v1]
Main additions:
- Norwegian operator Ace and South African operator Melusi
- House map rework
- Proximity Alarm secondary gadget

shadowlegacy.name: Y5S3_ShadowLegacy
shadowlegacy.description:
Operation Shadow Legacy is the 3rd season of the 5th year of Rainbow Six Siege. [Event: Sugar Fright]
Main additions:
- American operator Zero
- Chalet map rework
- Scope 1.5x, Scope 2.0x, Scope 3.0x, new holographic and new red dot sights
- Ping 2.0
- Hard Breach Charge secondary gadget
- reticle color customization
- reinforcement pool

neondawn.name: Y5S4_NeonDawn
neondawn.description:
Operation Neon Dawn is the 4th season of the 5th year of Rainbow Six Siege. [Event: Road to S.I. 2021]
Main additions:
- Thai operator Aruni
- Skyscraper map rework
- runout timer decreased to 1s (from 2s)
- changed defuser plant animation
- faster reinforcement animaton (reduced to 4.5s from 5.5s)

crimsonheist.name: Y6S1_CrimsonHeist
crimsonheist.description:
Crimson Heist is the 1st season of the 6th year of Rainbow Six Siege. [Event: Apocalypse and Rainbow is Magic v2]
Main additions:
- Argentinian operator Flores
- Border map rework
- GONNE-6
- Match Replay

northstar.name: Y6S2_NorthStar
northstar.description:
North Star is the 2nd season of the 6th year of Rainbow Six Siege. [Event: Containment]
Main additions:
- Native american operator Thunderbird
- Favela map rework
- Melusi rework
- Shattered glass mechanic for Mira and Maestro
- removal of dead bodies
- updated operator icons
- updated scoreboard
- removed bulletholes

crystalguard.name: Y6S3_CrystalGuard
crystalguard.description:
Crystal Guard is the 3rd season of the 6th year of Rainbow Six Siege. [Event: Doktor's Curse v2 and Showdown]
Main additions:
- Croatian operator Osa
- Bank, Clubhouse and Consulate mini-reworks
- Armor replaced by HP
- Opponents rim lighting
- updated flashes

highcalibre.name: Y6S4_HighCalibre
highcalibre.description:
High Calibre is the 4th season of the 6th year of Rainbow Six Siege. [Event: Road to S.I. 2022]
Main additions:
- Irish operator Thorn
- Outback map rework
- Updated HUD
- Team colors
- Full Elite customization

demonveil.name: Y7S1_DemonVeil
demonveil.description:
Operation Demon Veil is the 1st season of the 7th year of Rainbow Six Siege. [Event: Rengoku v1]
Main additions:
- Japanese operator Azami
- New map Emerald Plains
- Deathmatch mode
- Attacker repick
- Universal 1x sights
- Goyo rework

vectorglare.name: Y7S2_VectorGlare
vectorglare.description:
Operation Vector Glare is the 2nd season of the 7th year of Rainbow Six Siege. [Event: Mute Protocol v2]
Main additions:
- Belgian operator Sens
- New TDM map Close Quarter
- Shooting Range
- Operator Guides
- Screen Shake intensity option
- Third secondary weapon slot

brutalswarm.name: Y7S3_BrutalSwarm
brutalswarm.description:
Operation Brutal Swarm is the 3rd season of the 7th year of Rainbow Six Siege. [Event: Doktor Curse v3]
Main additions:
- singaporean operator Grim
- New map Stadium Bravo
- Impact EMPs secondary gadget
- Weapon recoil rework

solarraid.name: Y7S4_SolarRaid
solarraid.description:
Operation Solar Raid is the 4th season of the 7th year of Rainbow Six Siege. [Event: Snowball Fight v2]
Main additions:
- Colombian operator Solis
- New map Nighthaven Labs
- Team colors colored gadgets
- No friendly fire in the preparation phase
- Standardization of the moving speed while ADS
- AMD FidelityFX Super Resolution (FSR) 1.0 [Vulkan only]

commandingforce.name: Y8S1_CommandingForce
commandingforce.description:
Operation Commanding Force is the 1st season of the 8th year of Rainbow Six Siege. [Event: Rainbow is Magic v3]
Main additions:
- Brazilian operator Brava
- Reload rework
- Zero rework
- Updated main menu

dreadfactor.name: Y8S2_DreadFactor
dreadfactor.description:
Operation Dread Factor is the 2nd season of the 8th year of Rainbow Six Siege. [Event: Rengoku v2]
Main additions:
- Swedish operator Fenrir
- Consulate map rework
- Enhanced Shooting Range
- Observation Blocker secondary gadget
- Free for All gamemode
- Freecam in Match Replay

heavymettle.name: Y8S3_HeavyMettle
heavymettle.description:
Operation Heavy Mettle is the 3rd season of the 8th year of Rainbow Six Siege. [Event: Doktors Curse]
Main additions:
- Korean operator Ram
- 3 new tutorials
